verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- now there was אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And there was a man מֵֽהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> me-har- of mount אֶפְרָ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo whose name מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <S%H4319><s%> mi-Cha-ye-hu. Micaiah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לְאִמּ֡וֹ <S%H517><s%> le-'im-Mo unto his mother אֶלֶף֩ <S%H505><s%> 'e-Lef thousand וּמֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'Ah hundred הַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef [shekels] of silver אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֻֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> luk-kach- that were taken לָ֗ךְ Lach, ; וְאַתִּי ve-'at-ti כוְאַ֤תְּ <S%H859><s%> ve-'At you קאָלִית֙ <S%H422><s%> 'a-Lit from thee about which thou cursedst וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam again אָמַ֣רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mart and spakest בְּאָזְנַ֔י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nai, of also in mine ears הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- behold הַכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef behold the silver אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לְקַחְתִּ֑יו <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Tiv; [is] with me I took וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, it And his mother בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Ni my son לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [be thou] of the LORD

וַיָּ֛שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev And when he had restored אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶֽלֶף־ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef- thousand וּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'Ah hundred הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef [shekels] of silver לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> le-'im-Mo; to his mother וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said אִמּ֡וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo his mother הַקְדֵּ֣שׁ <S%H6942><s%> hak-Desh I had wholly הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> hik-Dash-ti dedicated אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּסֶף֩ <S%H3701><s%> hak-ke-Sef the silver לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD מִיָּדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Di from my hand לִבְנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Ni, for my son לַֽעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sOt to make פֶּ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Pe-sel a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> u-mas-se-Chah, and a molten image וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now אֲשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> 'a-shi-Ven-nu now therefore I will restore לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev Yet he restored אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef the money לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> le-'im-Mo; unto his mother וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took אִמּוֹ֩ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo and his mother מָאתַ֨יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred כֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [shekels] of silver וַתִּתְּנֵ֣הוּ <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-te-Ne-hu and gave לַצּוֹרֵ֗ף <S%H6884><s%> latz-tzo-Ref, them to the founder וַֽיַּעֲשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Se-hu who made פֶּ֣סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Pe-sel thereof a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> u-mas-se-Chah, and a molten image וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi were in בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit and they were in the house מִיכָֽיְהוּ׃ <S%H4319><s%> mi-Cha-ye-hu. Micaiah

וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish And the man מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah, Micah ל֖וֹ lo בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit had an house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of gods וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and made אֵפוֹד֙ <S%H646><s%> 'e-fOd an ephod וּתְרָפִ֔ים <S%H8655><s%> u-te-ra-Fim, and teraphim וַיְמַלֵּ֗א <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-Le, accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> yad able אַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad one מִבָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> mib-ba-Nav, of his sons וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- become ל֖וֹ lo לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> le-cho-Hen. who became his priest

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem, those אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; in Israel אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [but] every man הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nav in his own eyes יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh. did פ Peh

וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- now there was נַ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar, And there was a young man מִבֵּ֥ית mib-Beit לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> le-chem Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-Pa-chat of the family יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who לֵוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> le-Vi who [was] a Levite וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who גָֽר־ <S%H1481><s%> gar- and he sojourned שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech departed הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And the man מֵהָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> me-ha-'Ir, out of the city מִבֵּ֥ית mib-Beit לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> le-chem Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah לָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ba-'a-Sher wherever יִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> yim-Tza; where he could find וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo [a place] and he came הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- to mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit to the house מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah of Micah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot made דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ko. his journey

וַיֹּאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-mer- said ל֥וֹ lo מִיכָ֖ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah And Micah מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin unto him Whence תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo; comest וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer thou;And he said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לֵוִ֣י <S%H3881><s%> le-Vi unto him I [am] a Levite אָנֹ֗כִי <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi, I מִבֵּ֥ית mib-Beit לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> le-chem Bethlehem יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi and I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech, and I go לָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to sojourn בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ba-'a-Sher wherever אֶמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> 'em-Tza. where I may find

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said ל֨וֹ lo מִיכָ֜ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah And Micah שְׁבָ֣ה <S%H3427><s%> she-Vah unto him Dwell עִמָּדִ֗י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di, against וֶֽהְיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> veh-yeh- become לִי֮ li לְאָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av with me and be unto me a father וּלְכֹהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> u-le-cho-Hen and a priest וְאָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I אֶֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-ten- and I will give לְךָ֜ le-Cha עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret thee ten כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> ke-sef [shekels] of silver לַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> lai-ya-Mim, by the year וְעֵ֥רֶךְ <S%H6187><s%> ve-'E-rech and a suit בְּגָדִ֖ים <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dim of apparel וּמִחְיָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4241><s%> u-mich-ya-Te-cha; and thy victuals וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi. So the Levite

וַיּ֥וֹאֶל <S%H2974><s%> vai-Yo-'el was content הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi And the Levite לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet to dwell אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish; with the man וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar and the young man ל֔וֹ lo, כְּאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ke-'a-Chad was unto him as one מִבָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H1121><s%> mib-ba-Nav. of his sons

וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <S%H4390><s%> vay-mal-Le accomplish מִיכָה֙ <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah And Micah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad able הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi, the Levite וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- became ל֥וֹ lo הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar and the young man לְכֹהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> le-cho-Hen; became his priest וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi and lived בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit and was in the house מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah. of Micah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said מִיכָ֔ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah, Micah עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, Now know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- seeing יֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> yei-Tiv will do me good יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I that the LORD לִ֑י Li; כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki seeing הָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-yah- have לִ֛י li הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi seeing I have a Levite לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> le-cho-Hen. to [my] priest
